author: Phil Vickery
method: Place the sugar in a saucepan over a medium heat and cook for five minutes, until it caramelises. Remove from the heat, add the lemon juice and stir through hazelnuts. Drizzle out onto non-stick baking paper and leave to set. Once set, break up the crackle and serve with vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz caster sugar,  100g/3½oz hazelnuts, skinned and chopped,  1 tbsp lemon juice,  vanilla ice cream, to serve
